item.title: Why does Hebrews pretend to quote Jeremiah, then misrepresent it?
item.description: The definition of the promise commonly called the “New Covenant” is found in Jeremiah 31:31-34. For some reason, the writer of Hebrews misquotes Jeremiah 31:32. not like the covenant that I made with their fathers on the day when I took them by the hand to bring them out of the land of Egypt, my covenant that they broke, though I was their husband, declares the LORD.
